meanings.def: a plant whose leaves, flowers or seeds are used to add taste to food, in medicines or for their pleasant smell. parsley, mint and oregano are all herbs.
examples: Add a teaspoonful of mixed herbs.
Ali recommends taking herbs to facilitate recovery.
Serve cold, garnished with fresh herbs.
The shop sells a large range of herbs and spices.

meanings.def: a plant with a soft stem that dies down after flowering
a first name for boys, short for Herbert
